data.name: Secret Government Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Pull the strings of fate and rewrite history in Secret Government while listening to the game's official Soundtrack composed by Arseniy Trofim, Aleksei Budianskii, Tagir Sadyrbaev. The soundtrack features 21 tracks with over 100 minutes of mesmerizing music composed exclusively for the game.
data.about_the_game: Pull the strings of fate and rewrite history in Secret Government while listening to the game's official Soundtrack composed by Arseniy Trofim, Aleksei Budianskii, Tagir Sadyrbaev. The soundtrack features 21 tracks with over 100 minutes of mesmerizing music composed exclusively for the game.
data.short_description: The official soundtrack for Secret Government.
